I purchased a WindowsVPS and prepaid for a year but I no longer have any use for it. Has been up without any problems.

Specs: Windows 2008 R2 datacenter (license included), 1 GB RAM, 30 GB HDD, 1TB bandwidth. Valid until 22/10/2014. It seems there is a 10$ transfert fee.

If anyone would be interested, give me an offer
